033@MessageProps(
034    opCode=73,
035    size=8,
036    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
037    request=ReminderStatusRequest.class
038)
039public class ReminderStatusResponse extends NotificationMessage {
040    
041    private BigInteger intMap;
042    
043    public ReminderStatusResponse() {}
044    
045    public ReminderStatusResponse(BigInteger reminderBitmask) {
046        this.cargo = buildCargo(reminderBitmask);
047        this.intMap = reminderBitmask;
048        
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * <table border="1">
053     * <caption>Parsed fields for ReminderStatusResponse:</caption>
054     * <tr><td><code>intMap</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint64(raw, 0)</code></td></tr>
055     * </table>
056     */
057    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
058        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
059        this.cargo = raw;
060        this.intMap = Bytes.readUint64(raw, 0);
061        
062    }
063
064    
065    /**
066     * <table border="1">
067     * <caption>Byte layout for ReminderStatusResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
068     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
069     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>toUint64(reminderBitmask.longValue()) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
070     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>toUint64(reminderBitmask.longValue()) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
071     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>toUint64(reminderBitmask.longValue()) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
072     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>toUint64(reminderBitmask.longValue()) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
073     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>toUint64(reminderBitmask.longValue()) [byte 4]</code></td></tr>
074     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>toUint64(reminderBitmask.longValue()) [byte 5]</code></td></tr>
075     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>toUint64(reminderBitmask.longValue()) [byte 6]</code></td></tr>
076     * <tr><td>7</td><td><code>toUint64(reminderBitmask.longValue()) [byte 7]</code></td></tr>
077     * </table>
078     */
079    public static byte[] buildCargo(BigInteger reminderBitmask) {
080        return Bytes.combine(
081            Bytes.toUint64(reminderBitmask.longValue()));
082    }
083    
084    public BigInteger getIntMap() {
085        return intMap;
086    }
087    public long getBitMap() {
088        return intMap.longValue();
089    }
090
091
092    public Set<ReminderType> getReminders() {
093        return ReminderType.fromBitmask(getIntMap());
094    }
095
096    @Override
097    public int size() {
098        return getReminders().size();
099    }

101    public enum ReminderType implements NotificationEnum {

167
168        private final int id;
169        ReminderType(int id) {
170            this.id = id;
171        }
172
173        public int id() {
174            return id;
175        }
176
177        @Override
178        public int getId() {
179            return id;
180        }
181
182        public String toString() {
183            return name();
184        }
185
186        @Nullable public String getDescription() {
187            if (name().startsWith("DEFAULT_REMINDER")) return null;
188            return name();
189        }
190
191        public static Set<ReminderType> fromBitmask(BigInteger bitmask) {
192            Set<ReminderType> set = new TreeSet<>();
193            for (ReminderType a : values()) {
194                if (bitmask.testBit(a.id())) {
195                    set.add(a);
196                }
197            }
198            return set;
199        }
200
201        public static BigInteger toBitmask(ReminderType...alerts) {
202            BigInteger i = BigInteger.ZERO;
203            for (ReminderType a : alerts) {
204                i = i.setBit(a.id());
205            }
206            return i;
207        }
208    }
